page.title: 19BELINDA'S DAY ERDINGTON
page.content: 7 a.m. Dad woke me. I washed, dressed and went down to breakfast. 8.30 called for Fiona and Mel. Met Becky off the bus and walked to school. When the bell went we lined up. All other 4th Year classes had a day off due to teachers' action. 9.15 Assembly was taken by Mrs.Burns' class. After that we went into the library. 10.30 washed up with Tracey. After break we had environmental studies, we did some map work, then we had choir practice. 12.00 went home for lunch, had rolls and fruit. 1.15 Maths. great! - we used calculators. After break we did a Science experiment on Daphnia. 3.45 walked home, did piano practice, had tea; potatoes, fish fingers and salad. I washed up. 6.00 Dad went to sing in a production of "My Fair Lady". 8.00 watched T.V.and played piano.9.00 Bed.
